snippet.title: Mischief - Demo Announce Trailer with Subtitles
snippet.description:
Play the demo on Steam on April 3rd!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2844360/Mischief/

Mischief is a delightful and imaginative action/adventure video game where you step into the paws of a courageous rat, navigating through a captivating world within the nooks and crannies of a typical home and a bustling backyard.
In solo or cooperative play with up to four players, you'll face whimsical boss characters like Shovul, Scourge of the Sandbox, a sandbox toy monstrosity, Oscar, Pup of the Pit, the feisty hot dog on the grill, and the cheeky Moles, Avogadro, and Freckle, The Garden Guardians. As you meet these quirky foes, utilize a variety of household objects, such as crayons, forks, paperclips, ketchup, and more to defeat or befriend them.
Unearth hidden surprises, including intricate platforming courses, cooperative musical instruments, and over 100 achievements, making Mischief an enchanting adventure suitable for all ages.
